subject: Baseball
Memorabilia
Antiques
lead_paragraph: For decades, the mothers of America have been vilified for throwing out their children’s baseball cards. Now, good fortune has come Bernice Gallego’s way, out of somebody else’s discarded clutter.
snippet: For decades, the mothers of America have been vilified for throwing out their children’s baseball cards. Now, good fortune has come Bernice Gallego’s way, out of somebody else’s discarded clutter.
